mapper.select: SELECT A.FID, COUNT(*) AS sell , A.FNAME , A.FCATE , A.FIMG , ROUND( ((SUM(B.FO_PRICE)+ SUM(B.FO_DONATION)) / A.FGOAL) * 100) AS goal FROM FUNDING_PRODUCT A, FUNDING_ORDER B WHERE A.FID = B.FID GROUP BY A.FID, A.FNAME ,A.FCATE ,A.FGOAL,A.FIMG ORDER BY sell desc
